<p>An iPad might be the most versatile Apple device you can buy. They can run apps and games like your phone yet they're as powerful as some laptops. You can use them to read books like on an ereader or watch shows like its a mini TV. But they're not the cheapest tablets out there, so it's wise to look for sales when you can find them. You won't see discounts directly from Apple, but <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:1;pos:1" <h2 id="jump-link-best-ipad-deals">Best iPad deals</h2>

It’s wonderfully thin, its OLED display is one of the best we’ve seen on a consumer device and its M4 chip can handle virtually anything you’d ever do on an iPad. It’s also the only Apple tablet with Face ID and it has a better speaker setup than the iPad Air. We gave it a<a data-i13n="cpos:7;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/ipad-pro-2024-review-so-very-nice-and-so-very-expensive-210012937.html"> score of 84</a> in our review, with the only real drawback being its price. off)</strong></a>: Now that the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:11;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FQFB8FMG&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=AirPods+Pro+3&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3d3dy5hbWF6b24uY29tL0FwcGxlLUNhbmNlbGxhdGlvbi1UcmFuc2xhdGlvbi1IZWFkcGhvbmVzLUhpZ2gtRmlkZWxpdHkvZHAvQjBGUUZCOEZNRy8_&amp;signature=AQAAAVsr2xvEuVJ6IJvuO5VphcPBgnI4GS5mA4iRHjJB9JKS&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Cancellation-Translation-Headphones-High-Fidelity%2Fdp%2FB0FQFB8FMG%2F" isn't likely to be around much longer. But there's no telling when the new version will see a discount. The third-gen earbuds do have a <a data-i13n="cpos:12;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/airpods-pro-3-offer-live-translation-and-improved-noise-cancellation-171018061.html">bunch of new features</a>, but if you don't need the latest model, you may be perfectly happy with the second-generation buds. We gave them an <a data-i13n="cpos:13;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/airpods-pro-review-second-generation-130048218-130048292.html">88 in our review</a> and they held a top spot in our <a data-i13n="cpos:14;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/best-wireless-earbuds-120058222.html">best earbud guide</a> for years.&nbsp;</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:15;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DGHNXP5Y&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+Watch+Series+10+%28GPS+only%2C+46+mm%29+for+%24429+%28%2470+off%29&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAZ96As6v4FB8C0doVELXCW-0oduQ1pfkfNBaypgArBLQ&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Smartwatch-Aluminium-Fitness-Tracker%2Fdp%2FB0DGHNXP5Y%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-Smartwatch-Aluminium-Fitness-Tracker/dp/B0DGHNXP5Y/?th=1"><strong>Apple Watch Series 10 (GPS only, 46 mm) for $429 ($70 off)</strong></a>: This is another Apple device that's soon to be gone from the shelves — but it's worth noting that the new <a data-i13n="cpos:16;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/apple-watch-series-11-includes-5g-and-a-hypertension-tracking-feature-172451506.html">Series 11</a> and this model have the same hardware design (though the new one has a tougher screen) and both use the same processor chip. We named the Series 10 the <a data-i13n="cpos:17;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/best-smartwatches-153013118.html">best smartwatch</a> you can buy (just expect it to be usurped by the new generation) and gave it a <a data-i13n="cpos:18;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/wearables/apple-watch-series-10-review-legacy-and-sequel-in-equal-measure-120021405.html">90 in our review</a>. But if you want the latest watch, the <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:19;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0FQFL8PZ5&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+Watch+Series+11&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAASvUdguEZFrkeA2-G_hMeMcGubH_hbd4cJc9oeh_0od4&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-Watch-Smartwatch-Aluminium-Always%2Fdp%2FB0FQFL8PZ5%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-Watch-Smartwatch-Aluminium-Always/dp/B0FQFL8PZ5/?th=1">Apple Watch Series 11</a> is open for pre-orders now.&nbsp;</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:20;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0DCH8VDXF&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+EarPods+for+%2416+%28%243+off%29&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAVIdR1wgaHEEzO4aNUTM-7tW-Kk4yvrhy7W252vLeZWj&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2Fdp%2FB0DCH8VDXF%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0DCH8VDXF/?th=1"><strong>Apple EarPods for $16 ($3 off)</strong></a>: Some people prefer a wire with their earbuds. If that's you, you can snag these for just $16, which makes it one of the cheapest Apple-branded items you can get. They don't have the bells and whistles of the new <a data-i13n="cpos:21;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/audio/headphones/airpods-pro-3-offer-live-translation-and-improved-noise-cancellation-171018061.html">AirPods Pro 3</a>. But they're far more affordable.&nbsp;</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Amazon;elmt:;cpos:22;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=66ea567a-c987-4c2e-a2ff-02904efde6ea&amp;itemId=amazon_B0D54JZTHY&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Amazon&amp;linkText=Apple+AirTags+%284-pack%29+for+%2475+%28%2424+off%29&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAehKSLXvCtVpBPBdI3rkTM3-cZOJx04cf98waI24tz9g&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.amazon.com%2FApple-MX542LL-A-AirTag-Pack%2Fdp%2FB0D54JZTHY%2F" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.amazon.com/Apple-MX542LL-A-AirTag-Pack/dp/B0D54JZTHY/"><strong>Apple AirTags (4-pack) for $75 ($24 off)</strong></a>: We may see an updated model by the end of 2025, but the current AirTags are the <a data-i13n="cpos:23;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-bluetooth-tracker-140028377.html">best Bluetooth trackers</a> for iPhone users thanks to their vast finding network and accurate ultrawide band features that make it easy to locate things that're close by. Just note that you'll need a separate <a data-i13n="cpos:24;pos:1" href="https://www.engadget.com/computing/accessories/best-apple-airtag-cases-holders-accessories-123036404.html">AirTag holder</a> to attach them to your keys, wallet or bag. This isn't a great deal for a four-pack — the bundle was available for $70 last week and $65 during Amazon's Prime Day — but it's still a bit lower than the four-pack's list price. Also at <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Best Buy;elmt:;cpos:25;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=5e0bed65-d2f8-4b34-9b8f-955218c0e37a&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Best+Buy&amp;linkText=Best+Buy&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAaaOSaxiHXmnq5H4o7XJjVCRK08_IJMI3AXN7LU_g2Xr&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bestbuy.com%2Fproduct%2Fapple-airtag-4-pack-silver%2FJJGCQ8XFQH%2Fsku%2F6461349" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.bestbuy.com/product/apple-airtag-4-pack-silver/JJGCQ8XFQH/sku/6461349">Best Buy</a> and <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Walmart;elmt:;cpos:26;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Walmart&amp;linkText=Walmart&amp;custData=eyJzb3VyY2VOYW1lIjoiV2ViLURlc2t0b3AtVmVyaXpvbiIsImxhbmRpbmdVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3dhbG1hcnQuY29tL2lwLzUzOTUyNzc1NTc_c2VsZWN0ZWQ9dHJ1ZSIsImNvbnRlbnRVdWlkIjoiNWMyYjljMzMtOWE4Ny00NWZmLWI5NzgtZTQxYjhmN2E5MGEyIiwib3JpZ2luYWxVcmwiOiJodHRwczovL3dhbG1hcnQuY29tL2lwLzUzOTUyNzc1NTc_c2VsZWN0ZWQ9dHJ1ZSJ9&amp;signature=AQAAAfbeBzhh7J5JRKYYs6Sncc-8lfmjcgGvvb1j4ezyW-1E&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwalmart.com%2Fip%2F5395277557%3Fselected%3Dtrue" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://walmart.com/ip/5395277557?selected=true">Walmart</a>.</p> 
<p><a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Walmart;elmt:;cpos:27;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&amp;itemId=walmart_transaction_5539894453&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Walmart&amp;linkText=Apple+35W+Dual+USB-C+Port+adapter+for+%2439+%28%2420+off%29&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAa0fPx4ihBcX3-2IWKXL_RUVf3aykjgZLpAFaqOCGJkm&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FApple-35W-Dual-USB-C-Port-Compact-Power-Adapter%2F5539894453%3Fselected%3Dtrue" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.walmart.com/ip/Apple-35W-Dual-USB-C-Port-Compact-Power-Adapter/5539894453?selected=true"><strong>Apple 35W Dual USB-C Port adapter for $39 ($20 off)</strong></a>: It's always good to have a few extra ports around. This is the adapter that ships with the M4 with 10‑core GPU MacBook Air, and it can quickly charge iPads, iPhones and anything else powered by USB-C, too. Walmart is also selling Apple's <a data-i13n="elm:affiliate_link;sellerN:Walmart;elmt:;cpos:28;pos:1" href="https://shopping.yahoo.com/rdlw?merchantId=3719d8d4-5edd-4817-998a-91f3229e7323&amp;itemId=walmart_transaction_9315323910&amp;siteId=us-engadget&amp;pageId=1p-autolink&amp;contentUuid=5c2b9c33-9a87-45ff-b978-e41b8f7a90a2&amp;featureId=text-link&amp;merchantName=Walmart&amp;linkText=2-meter+fast+charge+cable&amp;&amp;signature=AQAAAaqPjnOSGuhn5VRpEiSMd_FhQB-eqCOTyupIkE_Ipe2Z&amp;gcReferrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FApple-240W-USB-C-Charge-Cable-2-m%2F9315323910%3Fselected%3Dtrue" class="rapid-with-clickid" data-original-link="https://www.walmart.com/ip/Apple-240W-USB-C-Charge-Cable-2-m/9315323910?selected=true">2-meter fast charge cable</a> for $23 ($6 off).&nbsp;</p>
